<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Scorpion Swarm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=357)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

While a single scorpion is itself a menace, swarms of these vermin can be outright devastating. These skittering droves of death swiftly bring down their prey before devouring everything short of the victim’s bones.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 19

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 4">[Scorpion Swarm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=357)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
<trait label="Swarm" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=239" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 285</row>

**Perception** +11; darkvision

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +11, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +6, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +11

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +5

**Con** +2

**Int** -5

**Wis** +0

**Cha** -4
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 21 

**Fort** +10 

**Ref** +13 

**Will** +8 

</row>

**HP** 55

**Immunities**
precision, swarm mind

**Resistances**
bludgeoning 3, piercing 7, slashing 7

**Weaknesses**
area damage 5, splash damage 5

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Scorpion Venom**  ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 18 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 1d6 poison damage (1 round); **Stage 2** 1d6 poison damage and [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) (1 round)

**Swarming Stings** <actions string="Single Action" />  Each enemy in the swarm’s space takes 2d8 piercing damage (DC 21 basic Reflex save) and is exposed to scorpion venom.

</column>
